name: OrthopoxCombinationTestsThatIncludeOrthopoxvirusNucleicAcid
title: Orthopox (Combination Tests that include Orthopoxvirus Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Orthopoxvirus Nucleic Acid in combination with at least one other organism.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Orthopoxvirus Nucleic Acid),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
